topics.title: Linganupat (Sex Ratio)
slides: [cite_start]"• **Paribhasha:** Prati hazaar purushon par striyon ki sankhya ko linganupat kehte hain[cite: 3037, 3038]."
[cite_start]"• **MP ka Linganupat:** Madhya Pradesh ka vartaman linganupat **931** hai[cite: 3011, 3039]."
[cite_start]"• **Vishesh Tathya:** **Rewa** ek matra aisa zila hai jiska linganupat rajya ke ausat (931) ke barabar hai[cite: 3040]."
[cite_start]"• **Sarvadhik Linganupat:** **Balaghat** (1021) mein sabse adhik linganupat hai, iske baad Alirajpur (1011) aur Mandla (1008) hain[cite: 3044]."
[cite_start]"• **Nyuntam Linganupat:** Sabse kam linganupat **Bhind** (837) ka hai, phir Morena (840) aur Gwalior (864) aate hain[cite: 3048]."

questions.questionText: Linganupat ki ikai (Unit) kya maani jaati hai?
Madhya Pradesh ka ausat linganupat kitna hai?
MP ka kaun sa zila rajya ke ausat linganupat ke barabar hai?
Sarvadhik linganupat wala zila kaun sa hai?
Balaghat ka linganupat kitna hai?
Madhya Pradesh mein nyuntam linganupat kis zile ka hai?
Bhind zile ka linganupat kitna darj kiya gaya hai?
Nyuntam linganupat mein Bhind ke baad dusra sthan kiska hai?

topics.title: Jansankhya Ghanatva (Density) aur Saksharta
slides: [cite_start]"• **Jan-ghanatva Paribhasha:** Prati varg kilometer kshetra mein rehne wale vyaktiyon ki sankhya[cite: 3053]."
[cite_start]"• **Sarvadhik Ghanatva:** Sabse zyada jan-ghanatva **Bhopal** (855) mein hai, iske baad Indore (841) aur Jabalpur (473) ka sthan hai[cite: 3057]."
[cite_start]"• **Nyuntam Ghanatva:** Sabse kam jan-ghanatva **Dindori** (94) mein hai, phir Sheopur (104) aur Panna (142)[cite: 3062]."
[cite_start]"• **Saksharta Dar:** MP ki saksharta dar **69.32%** hai (Bharat ki 73%)[cite: 3011]."

questions.questionText: Madhya Pradesh ka jansankhya ghanatva kitna hai?
Sarvadhik jansankhya ghanatva wala zila kaun sa hai?
Bhopal ka jansankhya ghanatva kitna hai?
Nyuntam jansankhya ghanatva kis zile mein paya jata hai?
Dindori ka jansankhya ghanatva kitna hai?
2011 ki jan-ganana ke anusar MP ki saksharta dar kitni hai?
Bharat ki saksharta dar 2011 mein kitni rahi?

topics.title: Anusuchit Jati (SC) aur Anusuchit Janjati (ST)
slides: [cite_start]"• **Paribhasha:** SC ko anuchhed 366(24) aur ST ko anuchhed 366(25) mein paribhashit kiya gaya hai[cite: 3072]."
[cite_start]"• **Sankhya:** MP mein SC ki jansankhya **15.6%** aur ST ki **21.1%** hai[cite: 3072]."
[cite_start]"• **SC Jansankhya:** Sabse zyada SC jansankhya **Indore** mein aur sabse kam **Jhabua** mein hai[cite: 3072]."
[cite_start]"• **ST Jansankhya:** Sabse zyada ST jansankhya **Dhar** mein aur sabse kam **Bhind** mein hai[cite: 3072]."
[cite_start]"• **Manyata Prapt Jatiyan:** MP mein manyata prapt 48 SC aur 46 ST jatiyan hain[cite: 3072]."

questions.questionText: MP mein Anusuchit Janjati (ST) ki jansankhya ka pratishat kitna hai?
Sarvadhik ST jansankhya wala zila kaun sa hai?
Nyuntam ST jansankhya wala zila kaun sa hai?
Anusuchit Jati (SC) ki sarvadhik jansankhya kis zile mein hai?
SC aur ST ko sanvidhan ke kis anuchhed mein paribhashit kiya gaya hai?
